name: Fortifine
description:
Place buildings within range of each other to score points

+25 points per building in range

You can only place the building if the radius is green

Reach the target score to complete the level 

 

'Left-Click' the item button to spawn a building


Move 'Mouse' to position the building


'Left-Click' again to place the building


Use 'Left/Right' arrow keys to rotate your view

Press 'Escape' to pause the game


Game Engine: Unity3D

3D Models: Blender

Audio: Audacity

UI: https://www.photopea.com/

Background sounds: https://freesound.org/people/Imjeax/sounds/427400/
